description: Monster Truck is a fun truck racing game, where you control a truck traveling on hilly terrain. There are places where the truck will fly into the air as it climbs hills at high speeds. You should try to perform stunts while the truck is in the air and help it land smoothly on the ground.

Monster trucks are extremely popular among off-roading enthusiasts. They are also extensively used in various racing and mud bogging events across the world. If you want to experience the thrill of driving a Monster Truck, then try vpl’s fun-filled Monster Truck game, which you can play online and earn real cash too!
Monster Truck is a fun truck racing game, where you control a truck traveling on hilly terrain. There are places where the truck will fly into the air as it climbs hills at high speeds.

data.header: Features of the Monster Truck game

description: There are two buttons, which can help you perform a forward or reverse flip. Use these two buttons to flip the truck in a clockwise or anticlockwise direction to score extra points. Pressing the two buttons simultaneously while the truck is in the air pulls it back to the ground.
There are two buttons, which can help you perform a forward or reverse flip. Use these two buttons to flip the truck in a clockwise or anticlockwise direction to score extra points.

content: Enter the game and you will see your favourite monster truck ready to hit the road.
The online monster truck game is played in landscape mode. You will see two buttons at the bottom which can be used to flip the truck clockwise or anticlockwise when in the air.
Each time you covplete a flip, you get bonus points which are added to your total score.
How to last longer in the game?

content.title: BOOST
content.text: Pick up the blue-coloured Nitrous Cylinders to increase the speed of your truck

content.title: MEDI-KITS
content.text: Collect the Medi-Kits to repair any damage to your truck

data.header: The Monster Truck Game will end if

content: You wreck the truck by landing badly

description: The Monster Truck game supports both tournament and battle formats. In the tournament format, the objective of the players is to get the best high score by the time the tournament ends. You can also choose to play live against another online player, where your goal is to last longer than your opponent.

data.header: The Maximum Amount Players can Win

description: On a typical day, there are players who win more than ₹10,000 per day playing Monster Truck. It is possible for skilled players to win more than ₹15,000 to ₹20,000 per day.

content.name: Can I control the speed of the truck?
How can I change the terrain?
description: You cannot change the terrain of the racing track.
